Review.Titre: Lack of Service
Pinzoo (and unfortunately NET10)
Review.Contenu: Why did ot take HOURS for my service to added to my phone? When I became concerned, I called. A recording recommended I leave a message, email, or engage in live chat. I'm not a fan of live chat, but I thought it was the most wisest remedy. Although it was thrown out there as an option, it evidently doesn't exist. Minutes will be added momentarily does not mean sometime within the next four hours. Why can your system not accommodate a more expeditious addition of service? AND then, I received no text informing me of minutes added and my end of service date. Why?

Review.Titre: Really lousy experience
Review.Contenu: It takes days for the pinzoo purchase to show up on the telephone when placed over the computer with a credit card. Sometimes there is some code that is also required to activate the account. That code is not shown unless one digs around for it as for why the phone is not working.   Past minutes are not carried over to new refills either.    This is a poor way to conduct business.

Review.Titre: Cheated out of service time
Review.Contenu: Sis & I had 3 Tracfones total, in our households.  We both added one or more 3-month service options so our service time would end at the same time (so we could remember it better).  Seems the service time we had previously paid for was lost, all we ended up with just the 3 months.  Service time ended months early and all our phones were useless, we couldn't even transfer our phone numbers to new phones. Emails asking for a refund for the time we lost were ignored.  WE WERE RIPPED OFF  New owners of Tracfone raised the prices, but we would have been better off just paying more through their website.

Review.Titre: I bought airtime into my mother's phone…
Review.Contenu: I bought airtime into my mother's phone in Nigeria and she was sent airtime that did not commensurate the amount I paid. I complained through Pinzoo's helpdesk. Till date, no one has called or written me in order to assist in solving the problem.

Like a terrible ex they will use their cheap fees to keep you and they do not want you looking for something better.

Review.Titre: Pinzoo's automatic refills.
Review.Contenu: I have Pinzoo automatically handling the purchase of Verizon's refill minutes. I've contacted Pinzoo requesting they take there charge on a regular date somewhere in the area of Verizon's deduction. Last months payment was on the 6th. Pinzoo payment keeps getting earlier and earlier, while Verizon remains the same. An adjustment needs to be made, putting both in sync.

Yes, I know that this is my fault for not keeping up with the company's policies, but I'm still entitled to be disappointed.And yet again I didn't manage to redeem my Pinzoo Points.  Wherever the checkbox or whatever is, why doesn't it default to "on"?
